text: Novaya Otradovka () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Otradovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,242 as of 2010. There are 25 streets. == Geography == It is located 5 km from Sterlitamak. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Novaya Otradovka
